page.title: 18Recreation
page.content: A survey of the leisure time of the 23 children in Class One revealed the following. {Television Watching: } 4 watched more than 20 hours of T.V. each week. 16 watched between 10 and 20 hours. 3 watched less than 10 hours. {Clubs not conected with School:} 13 belonged to at least 2 clubs. 3 belonged to 1 club 7 didn't belong to any clubs. {Home Reading } 2 read for at least 2 hours every day. 18 read for between half an hour and 2 hours. 3 didn't read much at all. {Play:} 12 played for at least 2 hours after School. 7 played for between 1 and 2 hours.
